attributes.title: No, just nah 🤢
attributes.review: I had downloaded the app to see if this Trump  was anything our a sexist🙄, racist😪, rapist😡, Cheeto🟠. Once I opened the app my eyes were burned by the images of a sweaty pig like cheeto working out 🏋️‍♀️, or well trying to 🤷‍♀️. My eyes continued to burn as though they were going to fall out 🤦‍♀️. My throat soon fell out and I was rushed to the hospital 🏥. THIS APP GAVE ME CORONA VIRUS 🦠. ONE BY ONE MY LIMBS FELL OFF DUE TO THE DISEASE THAT TRUMP HAS SPREAD TO ME.

attributes.title: WORST APP IN HISTORY
attributes.review: I downloaded this app earlier today while sitting next to my 5 YEAR OLD BROTHER , an d as I opened the app me and my brother saw a giant naked chetto man!🤢 ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING!!!! Don’t EVER download this app there is also so many glitches and, it has a virus that connects to your phone and switches your background to the image you see when you open the app🤮.

attributes.title: NEVER DOWNLOAD
attributes.review:
THIS APP KILLED MY PET CATERPILLAR!
I’m writing this in tears knowing that this stupid app cause my beloved caterpillar Natasha to die on SIGHT. BUT WAIT it gets worse the app then somehow hacked my phone and took a SCREENSHOT OF NATASHA!!! Then proceeded to put the photo up on a McDonald’s billboard 😭, advertising it as a new flavor milkshake that was called “support trump 2020” please whatever you do don’t download this app and may Natasha Rest In Peace.

attributes.title: infringing on my information
attributes.review: i open this app and the first thing they do is ask me for my information. what do they need it for? are they trying to keep tabs on me? at least when China takes my information they show me videos they know i will find funny

attributes.title: Absolutely Awful
attributes.review:
I wanted to learn about Mr. Trump’s Campaign, but when I opened the app I started to feel extremely nauseous because of the picture of him on the sign up page. I was trying to educate myself and I ended up getting really sick. 

I would definitely NOT recommend this app to other people.😔

attributes.title: Worst thing
attributes.review: I opened with app and I was sadly shown a picture of what a crusty carrot would look like. I was told that this would be about different trumps as I am interested in the environment m, but when I opened the app and saw a Cheeto of a man on my screen I was deeply disappointed. This app did not pass the vibe check.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!🤮
attributes.review: This app is the worst app EVER designed! As soon as I opened the app it started glitching! I tried downloading it again and again but it wouldn’t load! It took 3 hours that’s right 3 hours for it to load and when it did it was still glitching! This a horrible app and I would not recommend!!!!!!!!!

THIS APP IS TERRIBLE!!! I’m his own son and I can’t believe my father would do such a horrid this🤮this app is laggy, it glitches, and my father looks like a Cheeto in this! I don’t understand why he created this app it’s a waste of time and it’s just plain useless! It’s hacks all of your information and will cause death! Please do not buy this! 

Love, Barron Trump

attributes.title: no 💕
attributes.review: i downloaded this app thinking i would get to see a more positive insight on the presidents life, but all that would show up was this orange mucinex monster with a yellow wig on /: there were videos of this blob, sexually assaulting children ): and women ): and dogs ): He was being racist and homophobic too!! i don’t know what’s going on guys, but this app ain’t it!!

attributes.title: Unaesthetic
attributes.review: I truly think the graphic design of the app could have been much better, truly unaesthetic to the eye. I mean let’s talk about the image of Donny upon opening the app. Try getting a better photographer maybe? I’m sure it was just the angle and lightening that really emphasized his double chin and aged skin. Regardless, this app is a disgrace to the App Store.
